Key Arguments: The legislation gives too much power to the government to decide what constitutes misinformation or disinformation.
The legislation threatens fundamental rights to freedom of speech.
There is a concern about the potential for a totalitarian implementation of the bill.
Notable Quotes: We as Australian citizens are all slowly giving our fundamental rights of freedom to speak away.
I do not support anyone to have powers over my right to speak, post, or share with respect about concerns I have.
